titles.title: For the relief of Shwa-Chen Chai.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 5/20/2003--Introduced. Declares that for purposes of any determination of rights under Federal law pertaining to civil service retirement, Dr. An-Ti Chai shall be deemed: (1) to have been retired after being voluntarily separated from the service; and (2) to have made an election of a lump-sum payment for a life-threatening affliction or other critical medical condition.
